# firefly3 Provider

Terraform provider for [Firefly III](https://firefly-iii.org/), a free and open source personal finance manager.

This provider allows you to manage Firefly III resources such as categories, rule groups, and rules using Terraform.

## Authentication

The provider requires an API key to authenticate with your Firefly III instance. You can obtain a Personal Access Token by following the [Firefly III API documentation](https://docs.firefly-iii.org/how-to/firefly-iii/features/api/#personal-access-tokens).

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    firefly3 = {
      source = "renescheepers/firefly3"
    }
  }
}

provider "firefly3" {
  endpoint = "https://firefly.example.com"
  api_key  = "your-api-token-here"
}

# Create a category
resource "firefly3_category" "groceries" {
  name  = "Groceries"
  notes = "Supermarket and food shopping"
}

# Create a rule group
resource "firefly3_rule_group" "automation" {
  title       = "Automation Rules"
  description = "Automatically categorize transactions"
  active      = true
  order       = 1
}

# Create a rule
resource "firefly3_rule" "groceries_rule" {
  rule_group_id = firefly3_rule_group.automation.id
  title         = "Tag Grocery Transactions"
  description   = "Automatically categorize transactions from grocery stores"
  trigger       = "store-journal"
  active        = true
  strict        = false

  triggers = [
    {
      type  = "description_contains"
      value = "supermarket"
    },
    {
      type  = "description_contains"
      value = "grocery"
    }
  ]

  actions = [
    {
      type  = "set_category"
      value = firefly3_category.groceries.name
    }
  ]
}
```

## Using Environment Variables

Instead of hardcoding credentials in your Terraform configuration, you can use environment variables:

```terraform
provider "firefly3" {
  # endpoint and api_key will be read from environment variables
  # FIREFLY3_ENDPOINT and FIREFLY3_API_KEY
}
```

Set the environment variables before running Terraform:

```bash
export FIREFLY3_ENDPOINT="https://firefly.example.com"
export FIREFLY3_API_KEY="your-api-token-here"
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API key for the Firefly III API. Can also be set via the `FIREFLY3_API_KEY` environment variable.
- `endpoint` (String) Endpoint for the Firefly III API. Can also be set via the `FIREFLY3_ENDPOINT` environment variable.
